channel.title: Deltascape Stronger NPCs?
channel.description: I'm guessing its npchandler.java. Although whenever I try using the average random hitdiff code for monsters, it doesnt seem to work. Can anybody help me with this. I already beat Dad on my level 3 LOL.

item.title: Deltascape Stronger NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @ion5005 ion5005
item.description:
@ion5005 wrote:

NPCHandler.java is the folder.

To make NPC’s attack you first.

public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) { switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {

Search this, right below it are cases similar to these.

case 50: case 3200:
To make an NPC hit you just add the case, the case number is the NPC’s Id
Example would be case 1: This makes Men attack you. ‘1’ is the NPC’s ID.

To make a NPC stronger/weaker search for 1115, this is Bandos NPC code you’ll see if you read the codes the hits and stuff, just look through that its easy. Aslo search for Ahrims’ NPC code and you can see that to. Gl…

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape Stronger NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

moparwha:

I’m guessing its npchandler.java. Although whenever I try using the average random hitdiff code for monsters, it doesnt seem to work. Can anybody help me with this. I already beat Dad on my level 3 LOL.

Where you add which animation they do when attacking, inside the attackplayer method, you need to add:

hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(8);

The 1 would determine that the npcs lowest hit is 1, so it never hits 0.
The 8 would determine that the highest the npc can hit is 8, so it cannot hit 9 or above.

Read full topic
